item.description: Hi everyone!  My name is Daniel, my 3 housemates and I look forward to seeing you all for a lovely February raw potluck.  Please bring a 100% raw vegan (no honey!) dish with recipe. Potential sources of inspiration: www.rawmazing.com http://yummyrawfood.tumblr.com/ www.choosingraw.com Daniel (host) will share Kale & Seaweed Salad, Pistachio Cardamom & Lavender Coconut Milk Ice Cream (topped with sprouted dehydrated quinoa crumbles), and fresh homegrown Wheatgrass Juice. If you have any questions please call or email: 804.690.0458 daniel.thorpe01@gmail.com
item.how_to_find_us: Located just next to Porter Square. Street parking may get tricky if lots of people drive - you can always park in the Porter Square lot if needed. We're "Apartment #2" - just go in the main door and up the stairs to your right -there will be signs
item.name: Delicious Raw Vegan Potluck
